text: Innosilicon is a Chinese microprocessor company that develops GPUs. In November 2021, the company introduced the Fenghua 1 (Fantasy 1) discrete graphics processing unit (GPU). In August 2022, Innosilicon has introduced its second-generation standalone graphics processor, the Fenghua II (aka Fantasy II). Innosilicon is using Imagination's BXT-32-1024 GPU as the basis for its Fantasy (Fenghua) line of desktop graphics cards. == Notes == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Technology companies of the People's Republic of China
title: Innosilicon
